channel.title: Server Pk Pointz
channel.description: I'm running a 508and I'd really like to know how to change aroundthe PK points, forexample on my source you need 75 pk points to wield armadyl godsword i'd like to change the amount of pk points needed, does anybody know how?

item.title: Server Pk Pointz
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

mm… alright… there is either 2 places that would be in…
either your equipment file… net\packethandler\equipment.
or… item select maybe??? which is in the same directory… should be.

Read full topic
